blockquote.p: The value space indicates that at least one space is required at that position.

discussion.p: The following objection has been raised:

blockquote.p: Whitespace is optional when matching space. (See , para 2.)

discussion.note: Kona (2007): Bill to provide proposed wording. We agree that C++03 is ambiguous, and that we want C++0X to say "space" means 0 or more whitespace characters on input.
